title: WhatsApp for Mac set to bring another way to react to a message
content:
Last week, 9to5Mac reported that WhatsApp for Mac was finally readying the iMessage-like Reactions feature. Now, it seems the company keeps adding new ways to use this function in a future update.

moreâ€¦

The post WhatsApp for Mac set to bring another way to react to a message appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp for Mac is readying the iMessage-like Reactions feature. Now, it seems the company keeps adding new ways to use this function.
